title.rendered: Congratulations on ITS Achievement in Ranking First in Indonesia in Computer Science Based on the SIR Version

content.rendered: The Faculty of Intelligent Electrical and Informatics Technology congratulates the success of the Sepuluh Nopember Institute of Technology (ITS) which has been ranked first in the field of Computer Science in Indonesia according to the Scimago Institutions Rankings (SIR) version. Hopefully ITS can continue to maintain and to increase this glorious achievement.

excerpt.rendered: The Faculty of Intelligent Electrical and Informatics Technology congratulates the success of the Sepuluh Nopember Institute of Technology (ITS) which has been ranked first in the field of Computer Science in Indonesia according to the Scimago Institutions Rankings (SIR) version. Hopefully ITS can continue to maintain and to increase this glorious achievement.
